name: py-text-unidecode
description:
text-unidecode is the most basic port of the Text::Unidecode Perl
library.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-faker
dependent_to.description:
Faker is a Python package that generates fake data for you. Whether you
need to bootstrap your database, create good-looking XML documents,
fill-in your persistence to stress test it, or anonymize data taken from
a production service, Faker is for you.

dependent_to.name: py-python-slugify
dependent_to.description: A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode
